module.name: robotSkeletonPublisher
module.description: This module publish the skeleton representing the robot.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the BSD 3-Clause License.
module.description-long: This module connects to robot's state ports to retrieve the joints and then uses such information to compute the 3D configuration of the limbs. The resulting skeleton is sent to the viewer.

param.desc: Name of the robot to connect to.

output.description: Outputs 3D skeletons to send to \ref skeletonViewer for visualization.
